name: Lake Malawi National Park
description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site famous for its crystal-clear waters and diverse cichlid fish species.

name: Mount Mulanje
description: Known as the 'Island in the Sky', Mount Mulanje offers hiking trails, waterfalls, and breathtaking views.

name: Liwonde National Park
description: Home to elephants, hippos, and a variety of bird species along the Shire River.

name: Zomba Plateau
description: A lush mountain plateau with pine forests, waterfalls, and panoramic viewpoints.

name: Mzuzu Market
description: A vibrant market offering fresh produce, crafts, and local delicacies.

name: Kuti Wildlife Reserve
description: A community-owned reserve with zebras, antelopes, and birdwatching opportunities.

name: Nkhotakota Wildlife Reserve
description: One of Africaâ€™s oldest protected areas, rich in biodiversity.

name: Chongoni Rock Art Area
description: Features ancient rock paintings depicting the cultural history of Malawi.
